# Threat Model: System Name

## Assets
What must be protected?

## Entry Points
Where can attacks originate?

## Trust Boundaries
Where do security assumptions change?

## Threats (STRIDE)
- Spoofing
- Tampering
- Repudiation
- Information Disclosure
- Denial of Service
- Elevation of Privilege

## Mitigations
Controls and safeguards.

## Residual Risk
Remaining known risk.
